formal_name: Shining Force™: The Sword of Hajya
description:
The peaceful Kingdom of Cypress has
been disrupted by the corrupt ambition
of the evil King Iom. Terror rampages
across the land as the Castle of
Cypress is invaded and the magical
Sword of Hajya is taken! It will take
strength, courage, agility and your
keen sense of strategy to defy this
ominous power and bring peace back
to the land.
name: Shining Force™: The Sword of Hajya
